text: Burtsevka () is a rural locality (a village) in Duvansky Selsoviet, Duvansky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 39 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 76 km from Mesyagutovo, 6 km from Duvan. == References == Category:Rural localities in Duvansky District
title: Burtsevka
